member.name: T:com.gigatms.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: 用於查詢當地語系化字串等的強類型資源類別。

member.name: P:com.gigatms.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: 傳回這個類別使用的快取的 ResourceManager 執行個體。

member.name: P:com.gigatms.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: 覆寫目前執行緒的 CurrentUICulture 屬性，對象是所有 使用這個強類型資源類別的資源查閱。

member.summary: The ouput data is PC + EPC field fields data.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.TagPresentedType.PC_EPC_TID
member.summary: The ouput data is PC + EPC fields + TID bank data.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.Session
member.summary: Sesson is a flag that indicates whether a tag may respond to an reader. Tags maintain a separate inventoried flag for each of four sessions.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.Session.S0
member.summary: Session 0 is selected for an inventory round.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.Session.S1
member.summary: Session 1 is selected for an inventory round.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.Session.S2
member.summary: Session 2 is selected for an inventory round.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.Session.S3
member.summary: Session 3 is selected for an inventory round.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.Session.SL
member.summary: A selected flag, SL, which a reader may assert or deassert using a Select command.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.Target
member.summary: Target indicates whether the Select modifies a Tag’s SL flag or its inventoried flag, and in the case of inventoried it further specifies one Of four sessions.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.Target.A
member.summary: Tagget A selected for S0 to S3.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.Target.B
member.summary: Target B selected for S0 to S3.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.Target.A_B
member.summary: Toggle target A, B for S0 to S3..

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.Target.deSL
member.summary: Target A selected for SL session.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.Target.SL
member.summary: Target B selected for SL session.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.Target.SL_deSL
member.summary: Toggle target A, B for SL session.

members.member:
Specifies the way of triggering to turn on the RF power to read tag data.
/>

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.TriggerType.Command
member.summary: The RF power is turning on when calliing method.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.TriggerType.DigitalInput
member.summary: The RF power is turning on when user presses the button.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.TriggerType.Sensor
member.summary: The RF power is turning on when the sensor detects a tag.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.OutputInterface
member.summary: Specifies the data ouput interface.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.OutputInterface.HIDnVCOM
member.summary: The data is output via HID virtual comport interface.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.OutputInterface.BLE
member.summary: The data is output via BLE interface.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.OutputInterface.TCP_Client
member.summary: The data is output via TCP client interface.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.OutputInterface.TCP_Server
member.summary: The data is output via TCP server interface.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.OutputInterface.Default
member.summary: The data is output by auto.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.KeyboardSimulation
member.summary: Specifies the interface of keyboard output.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.KeyboardSimulation.Disable
member.summary: Disable keyboard output.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.KeyboardSimulation.HID
member.summary: HID keyboard output.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.KeyboardSimulation.BLE
member.summary: BLE keyboard output.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.EventType
member.summary: Specifies the event command type.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.EventType.TagPresented
member.summary: The event indicates the tag is presented.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.EventType.TagPresentedWithRemoved
member.summary: The event indicates the tag is presented then removed.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.EventType.TagPresentedEx
member.summary: The event indicates the tag is presented with extension message.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.IOState
member.summary: Specifies the state of I/O pin.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.IOState.Low
member.summary: The I/O pin is in low state.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.IOState.High
member.summary: The I/O pin is in high state.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.IONumber
member.summary: Specifies the number of IO pin for selecting to access.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.IONumber.Output_Pin_0
member.summary: Selects output I/O pin 0

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.IONumber.Output_Pin_1
member.summary: Selects output I/O pin 1

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.IONumber.Output_Pin_2
member.summary: Selects output I/O pin 2

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.IONumber.Input_Pin_0
member.summary: Selects input I/O pin 0

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode
member.summary: Specifies the result of invoking method.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_NONE
member.summary: Request command completed successfully

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_UNKNOWN
member.summary: Unknown error

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_NOMEM
member.summary: No available memory to process request command

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_BUSY
member.summary: Command was rejected by the device, this could be caused by the device is busy in processing the previous command.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_IO
member.summary: The inputs/outpus of device occurs an unexcepted error that cannot be handled by device.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_TIMEOUT
member.summary: Cannot get reply command for a specified period of seconds.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_REQUEST
member.summary: The request command is not supported by device.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_NOMSG
member.summary: Cannot get message data from device.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_PARAM
member.summary: The reply data is invalid or cannot parse correctly.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_PROTO
member.summary: The command format is invalid.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_PROTO_CRC
member.summary: The CRC caculation error is detected.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_CHIP_NORESP
member.summary: RF Chip doesn't respond to MCU (Timeout).

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_CHIP_HEADER
member.summary: Header Bit=1.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_CHIP_PREAMBLE
member.summary: Signals to MCU that there was an error during preamble detection or FIFO overflow happened during reception or transmission.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_CHIP_RXCOUNT
member.summary: Signals the MCU that the reception was shorter than expected or an error caused by a disabled command or protocol violation was observed during reception.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_CHIP_CRC
member.summary: Tag reply CRC error.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_CHIP_FIFO
member.summary: A fifo underflow IRQ is not produced.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_CHIP_REFLECTED_POWER
member.summary: Chip reflected power error.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_CHIP_BUS_PINS
member.summary: Data bus interface pins not working.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_CHIP_ENABLE_PIN
member.summary: The enable pin is not working.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_CHIP_CRYSTAL
member.summary: Crystal is not stable.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_CHIP_LOCK_PLL
member.summary: PLL is not locked.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_CHIP_RF_POWER_OFF
member.summary: RF Power is Off.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_SELECT
member.summary: Error when selecting tag.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_ACCESS
member.summary: Error on sending access password.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_REQRN
member.summary: Error on sending ReqRN.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_CHANNEL_TIMEOUT
member.summary: Error on RF channel timed out.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_PC_LENGTH_ERROR
member.summary: Error on EPC Length.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_WRITE_CHECK_ERROR
member.summary: Error on writing tag data.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_HANDLE_ERROR
member.summary: Error on getting tag handle.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_ACK_NO_EPC
member.summary: After ACK command the tag no reply EPC.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_NOT_COVERED
member.summary: Catch-all for errors not covered by other codes.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_NO_SUPPORTED
member.summary: The Tag does not support the specified parameters or feature.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_PRIVILEGES
member.summary: The Interrogator did not authenticate itself with sufficient privileg-es for the Tag to perform the operation.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_MEMORY_OVERRUN
member.summary: The Tag memory location does not exist, is too small, or the Tag does not support the specified EPC length.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_MEMORY_LOCK
member.summary: The Tag memory location is locked or permalocked and is either not writeable or not readable.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_CRYPTO
member.summary: Catch-all for errors specified by the cryptographic suite.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_NOT_ENCAPSULATED
member.summary: Command not encapsulated The Interrogator did not encapsulate the command in an AuthComm or SecureComm as required.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_BUFFER_OVERFLOW
member.summary: The operation failed because the ResponseBuffer overflowed.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_SECUREITY_TIMEOUT
member.summary: The command failed because the Tag is in a security timeout.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_ERROR_NO_POWER
member.summary: The Tag has insufficient power to perform the operation.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_GEN2_ERROR_UNKNOWN
member.summary: The Tag does not support error-specific codes.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_TAG_INVALID_PASSWORD
member.summary: The password is incorrect – tag is not open. The IDS custom password protection is active.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_TAG_BATTERY
member.summary: The battery measurement can not be started. The tag is fully passive and there is no battery attached.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_TAG_INVALID_COMMAND
member.summary: Command is not allowed in active state. Custom commands that can modify logging and calibration parameters are not allowed

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ErrorCode.ERR_TAG_EEPROM_BUSY
member.summary: The memory can not be accessed as the measurement unit or SPI is accessing the EEPROM. This error is reported when the EEPROM.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.MemoryBankSelection
member.summary: Specifies the output tag data source.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.MemoryBankSelection.PC
member.summary: Output PC field of EPC bank.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.MemoryBankSelection.EPC
member.summary: Output EPC ID field of EPC bank.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.MemoryBankSelection.TID
member.summary: Output TID bank data.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.MemoryBankSelection.USER
member.summary: Output User bank data.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.MemoryBankSelection.EPC_ASCII
member.summary: Output EPC ID field in ASCII encoding format.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.PostDataDelimiter
member.summary: Specifies the delimeter append to the end of output data.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.PostDataDelimiter.CR
member.summary: Carriage (0x0D) delimeter

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.PostDataDelimiter.LF
member.summary: Line feed (0x0A) delimeter

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.PostDataDelimiter.TAB
member.summary: Tab (0x09) delimeter

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.ActiveMode
member.summary: Specifies the operation mode of reading a tag.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ActiveMode.READ
member.summary: Auto reads tag data by specified decode type. The data will post to caller by event API.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ActiveMode.COMMAND
member.summary: Turn off RF power. Needs to issue a command to access the tag data, such as ReadTag, Write Tag.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ActiveMode.TAG_ANALYSIS
member.summary: Auto reads and send out the tag specification.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ActiveMode.VERIFY
member.summary: Verify external bar code scanner data with encoded tag data. If it passed, it sends the bar code data in keystrokes.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ActiveMode.ENCODE
member.summary: Encode external bar code scanner data in specified format and then write to tags.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ActiveMode.CUSTOMIZED_READ
member.summary: Only read the tag which its EPC prefix is same to the one defined in Deactivate and Reactivate mode. The EPC prefix is select-able to be replaced by the one defined in Deactivate and Reactivate mode.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ActiveMode.DEACTIVATE
member.summary: Use Deactivated EPC prefix to replace EPC prefix of tags.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ActiveMode.REACTIVATE
member.summary: Use Reactivated EPC prefix to replace EPC prefix of tags.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ActiveMode.DEACTIVATE_USER_BANK
member.summary: Use Deactivated User memory prefix to replace EPC prefix of tags.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.ActiveMode.REACTIVATE_USER_BANK
member.summary: Use Reactivated User memory prefix to replace EPC prefix of tags.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.LockAction
member.summary: Specifies the action of locling memory.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.LockAction.UNLOCK
member.summary: Unlock the memory.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.LockAction.LOCK
member.summary: Lock the memory.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.LockAction.PERMANENT_UNLOCK
member.summary: Permanent unlock the memory.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.LockAction.PERMANENT_LOCK
member.summary: Permanent lock the memory.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.State
member.summary: Specifies the state.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.State.OFF
member.summary: The state is off.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.State.ON
member.summary: The state is on.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.ClientSocket
member.summary: Presents the information about the socket of incoming connection.

member.name: P:com.gigatms.Parameters.ClientSocket.Address
member.summary: Gets the IP and port information
member.returns: The IP and port information.The format is: IP:Port

member.name: P:com.gigatms.Parameters.ClientSocket.IsConnected
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the underlying Client socket Is connected to a remote reader.
member.returns: true if the Client socket was connected to a remote reader; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:com.gigatms.Parameters.ClientSocket.Timeout
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies the number of mini-seconds before a timeout occurs when an operation doesn't finish.

member.name: P:com.gigatms.Parameters.ClientSocket.IsBusy
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the Client socket is under busy state or not.
member.returns: true if the Client socket is under busy state; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData
member.summary: Presents the tag data information.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.DeviceAddress
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates which device address (number) reads the tag data.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.DeviceSerialNumber
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the device serial number information.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.TID
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the TID data information.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.TagSerialNumber
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the tag serial number information.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.InputDecodedType
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the type of decoding tag data.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.Data
member.summary: Gets a list of reading tag data information.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.DecodedType
member.summary: Specifies the type of decoding tag data.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.DecodedType.TagData
member.summary: Use KeyboardOutputFormatOption setting to decode and output data.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.DecodedType.UDC
member.summary: Use UDC format to decode tag data.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.DecodedType.EAN_UPC
member.summary: Use EAN/UPC format to decode tag data.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.DataInfo
member.summary: Presents the tag data information.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.DataInfo.Length
member.summary: Ges a value that indicates the tag data size in byte.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.DataInfo.OutputDataType
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the output data format.

member.name: M:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.DataInfo.ToString
member.summary: Converts the value Of this instance To its equivalent string representation.
member.returns: The string representation of the value of this instance as specified by provider. The string format is determined by the DecodeType value. If the DecodeType is Tag and UDC, the string format is HEX string. If is EAN_UPC, then the string format is ASCII string.

member.name: M:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.DataInfo.ToBytes
member.summary: Converts the value Of this instance To its equivalent byte array representation.
member.returns: The byte array representation of the value of this instance as specified by provider

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.TIDInfo
member.summary: Presents the TID information that reads from the TID band of tag memory.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.TIDInfo.Length
member.summary: Ges a value that indicates the TID size in byte.

member.name: M:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.TIDInfo.ToBytes
member.summary: Converts the value Of this instance To its equivalent byte array representation.
member.returns: The byte array representation of the value of this instance as specified by provider

member.name: M:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.TIDInfo.ToHexString
member.summary: Converts the value Of this instance To its equivalent HEX string representation.
member.returns: The HEX string representation of the value of this instance as specified by provider

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.TagSerialNumberInfo
member.summary: Presents the tag serial number information. The tag serial number may be idential to the barcode attached to the tag

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.TagSerialNumberInfo.Length
member.summary: Ges a value that indicates the tag serial number in bit.

member.name: M:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.TagSerialNumberInfo.ToBytes
member.summary: Converts the value Of this instance To its equivalent byte array representation.
member.returns: The byte array representation of the value of this instance as specified by provider

member.name: M:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.TagSerialNumberInfo.ToHexString
member.summary: Converts the value Of this instance To its equivalent HEX string representation.
member.returns: The HEX string representation of the value of this instance as specified by provider

member.name: M:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.TagSerialNumberInfo.ToDecimal
member.summary: Converts the value Of this instance To its equivalent decimal number representation.
member.returns: The decimal number representation of the value of this instance as specified by provider

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.DeviceSerialNumberInfo
member.summary: Presents the device serial number information.

member.name: F:com.gigatms.Parameters.DecodedTagData.DeviceSerialNumberInfo.Length
member.summary: Ges a value that indicates the data size in byte for the device serial number.

member.name: P:com.gigatms.TS800.OutputPin0State
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the output I/O pin 0 state which is high or low.
member.returns: low if the output I/O pin 0 is in low state; otherwise, high. The default is low.
member.remarks: It needs to invoke the GetIOState() method to update this property value.

member.name: P:com.gigatms.TS800.OutputPin1State
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the output I/O pin 1 state which is high or low.
member.returns: low if the output I/O pin 1 is in low state; otherwise, high. The default is low.
member.remarks: It needs to invoke the GetIOState() method to update this property value.

member.name: P:com.gigatms.TS800.OutputPin2State
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the output I/O pin 2 state which is high or low.
member.returns: low if the output I/O pin 2 is in low state; otherwise, high. The default is low.
member.remarks: It needs to invoke the GetIOState() method to update this property value.

member.name: P:com.gigatms.TS800.InputPin0State
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the input I/O pin 0 state which is high or low.
member.remarks: It needs to invoke the GetIOState() method to update this property value.

member.summary: Get the state of all I/O pin.
member.returns: Return true if the operation is OK. Return false If the operation Is failed.
member.remarks: The read state values are all stored in the IO0State, IO1State, IO2State properties.

member.name: M:com.gigatms.UHF.ReadTag(System.String,com.gigatms.Parameters.MemoryBank,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads tag data from given memory bank.
member.param: Specifies the password to write data.
Specifies which memory bank to read.
Specifies the start word address of memory bank to read data. When read EPC bank, notice that EPC starts from address 02, the first two 2 words are for CRC and PC.
Specifies the length read from memory bank.
member.returns: The data to read out.

member.name: M:com.gigatms.UHF.ReadTag(System.String,System.String,com.gigatms.Parameters.MemoryBank,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads tag data from given memory bank.
member.param: Specifies the password to write data.
Specifies the access password to get the permission to access tag data.
Specifies which memory bank to read.
Specifies the start word address of memory bank to read data. When read EPC bank, notice that EPC starts from address 02, the first two 2 words are for CRC and PC.
Specifies the length read from memory bank.
member.returns: The data to read out.

member.name: M:com.gigatms.UHF.WriteTag(System.String,com.gigatms.Parameters.MemoryBank,System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Writes specified data to given memory bank.
member.param: Specifies the password to write data.
Specifies which memory bank to write.
Specifies the start word address of memory bank to write data.When write EPC bank, notice that EPC starts from address 02, the first two 2 words are for CRC and PC.
Specifies the data to write to memory bank.
member.returns: Return true if the operation is OK. Return False If the operation Is failed.

member.name: M:com.gigatms.UHF.WriteTag(System.String,System.String,com.gigatms.Parameters.MemoryBank,System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Selects a tag and writes specified data to given memory bank.
member.param: Specifies the tag EPC to be selected.
Specifies the password to write data.
Specifies which memory bank to write.

member.name: T:com.gigatms.Gen2.SelectTagAction
member.summary: Action elicits the Tag behavior in Table 6.30, in which matching and not-matching Tags assert or deassert SL or set their inventoried flag to A or B. A Tag conforming to the contents of the MemBank, Pointer, Length, and Mask fields is matching. A Tag not conforming to the contents of these fields is not-matching. The criteria for determining whether a Tag is matching or not-matching are specified by the MemBank, Pointer, Length and Mask fields.
member.remarks: SL: assert SL NSL: deassert SL A: inventoried → A B: inventoried → B
